entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Amherst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:07 PM AST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nappan AAFC 7:00 PM AST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: SSW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 10 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:05 PM AST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:05 PM AST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 5:05 PM AST Sunday 25 December 2022
